page.title: 12CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: {... Children's Games.. {Kick the Can.} You get a can or a plastic bottle & put it on the floor. Someone kicks it & all the others run away and hide.The person who kicked it is on & looks for the others.If he sees anyone he calls KICK THE CAN - SEE YOU ...Those who are not seen must run up and kick the can before they are caught.The game starts again with the first caught being on. {Piggy in the Middle.}For this game you have 3 people.One in between the other two.The people at the sides have to try to keep the ball away from the Piggy.If he gets the ball,the person who threw it last is then Piggy. Mud Ball.One person stands on either side of a cattle grid.The ball is then thrown to hit the grid.Where it lands it must be thrown from.The winner of the game is the least muddy person.
